name: Broken Controller
description:
Everyone loves a good, straight-forward twin stick shooter. Dodge incoming enemies and gun them down before they overwhelm you.

Simple.

...Right?

Use the WASD and arrow keys to move and shoot, not respectively.

Original music by Petraller.

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 by Clarence "Petraller" Tay.
